import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Addcustomer = () => { const [check, setCheck] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [user, setUser] = useState({ phone: "", customer_type: "", fname: "", lname: "", email: "", address: "", postalcode: "", link: "", orgno: "", phone: "", orgname: "", orgemail: "", orgaddress: "", notes: "", }); const userHandler = event => { setUser({ ...user, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); if (user.customer_type == "Private") { setCheck(true); } else if (user.customer_type == "Bedrift") { setCheck(false); } } const submitHandler = async event => { event.preventDefault(); const data = await axios.post(`http://localhost:10101/customer`, user); navigate('/dataman'); } const closeHandler = () => { navigate('/dataman'); } return (

Add Customer

{ check ? <>
: "" }
) } export default Addcustomer;
